Question: Shanghai Dese Industrial Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shanghai Dese Industrial Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Professional and innovative manufacturer of high-quality pellet grills, charcoal grills, and gas grills
- Specializes in producing a range of accessories essential for grilling, including PID controllers, grill grates, feeding motors, ignition rods, and more
- Scientifically managed production system ensuring highest quality and meeting strict industry standards
- One-stop service from product design to final delivery, with a dedicated R&D team for innovative products
- Competitive pricing due to efficient production processes and economies of scale
- Vision to make high-quality pellet grills accessible to everyone
- Continuous research and development, human-centered design, and high standard production line
- Rigorous quality assurance process and certifications including EN1860, CE, GS, ETL, CSA, ISO 9001, and high-grade 304 stainless steel
- Commitment to continuous advancement and investment in R&D for innovative technologies and materials
